documents.document: @beirchearts Apparently so. A sodomite. Didn't you get ordained online somewhere? Should add that to the name.

My veins remain difficult to find. I am the blood donor clinic's nightmare.

Both times I've been to the National Gallery there has been a Turner exhibition and both times it's been an extremely pleasant surprise
Don't want to make anybody feel guilty but it can be a little lonely when the majority of your closest friends are in relationships?
Seeing excited children at the Dead Zoo is giving me a new lease of life
Day so far: I moved a bumblebee off the footpath and saw some yellow crocuses from the bus window.
I’m angry about a lot of things today so I’m going to eat some cereal and visit some museums
Still shocked about the JLPT.
Case in point: While writing that last tweet, I spent more than a minute thinking about past tense forms of “nosedive”. Nosedived?Nosedove?
I am convinced that my communication skills have nosedived as a direct result of being a language student

Something about her accent nagged me the whole time I watched this the first time and now I know why! She is not actually Irish
Yer wan in Sing Street is channeling Evanna Lynch.
Increase in number of random accounts following me. Nothing to see here.

Something like six hours have passed since I got back? How did I manage to lose those hours? What have I been doing???
You know that feeling when you come home early to eat and intend to go back to study and then suddenly it’s after midnight? Yeah, that.
Here’s a phrase I just heard that I don’t understand: “Overwhelming minority” … This is an oxymoron, surely?

Even just the visual of someone yelling dramatically at the sea and walking deeper into the waves with irritation is really great. A++
“I just want to eat delicious food without having to work!! I just want to sleep in my cosy bed without doing anything!! Aghhhhh!!”
Basically: The guy is yelling “Everything is such a pain! I hate having to go to work in the morning! I’m not bothered!”

and she said “Oh I’m actually just after finding a camera!” and then someone came over to hand in her phone. Happy endings all around!
Apparently the girl who handed it in had asked about a lost phone and someone said “oh that’s awful another girl’s after losing her camera”
I’m so happy to have my camera back. Had a great exchange about it at the issue desk of the library.
Dear whoever handed in my camera, Thank you!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
